titleStmt.title: English Cretes and atheistical Christians describ'd and instanced with directions for the reformation of all, from St. Paul's Epistle to Titus, the first Bishop of Crete : wherein is intimated the sacred order, and supreme power of episcopacy in the church, with the inferior ministry : concluding all with supplemental instances, and a lamentation of the churches present miseries.
titleStmt.author: T. W.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
